text: Manjalo kwathi lapho (indodana yakhe) seyikhule ngokwanele ukuhamba naye wathi, â€œOh ndodana yami! Ngempela mina ngibone ephusheni lami	ngikunikela, ngakho-ke bheka ubonani, yathi (indodana yakhe) Oh baba wami! Yenza lokho okuphoqwayo, uzongithola ngingowababekezelayo uma uMvelinqangi ethanda
